question.title: Cannot open Eclipse IDE, Eclipse not launching after initial launch
question.body:
I'm having trouble running eclipse, I was able to start and run the program after the initial download but after making some tutorial programs and closing it I am unable to open it again. I can open it if I uninstall it and redownload it, but everytime I close out of it and try to reopen it, it pops up with the loading screen.

I want to open eclipse IDE without encountering the above error.I have installed and reinstalled the IDE as well as the JDK but still cannot fix it.
